meanings.sent1: The fabric was unpuckered and smooth.
meanings.sent2: Her unpuckered shirt looked neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The unpuckered paper lay flat on the desk.
meanings.sent4: The unpuckered surface reflected the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The unpuckered skin felt soft to the touch.

meanings.definition: To smooth out or relax (wrinkles or puckers)
meanings.sent1: She carefully unpuckered the bedsheet before making the bed.
meanings.sent2: He unpuckered his forehead after a long day of frowning.
meanings.sent3: The tailor unpuckered the fabric with skillful hands.
meanings.sent4: The therapist helped her unpucker the tension in her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The warm iron easily unpuckered the creases in the shirt.
